articles.title: Bruins give up 4 goals to Canadiens in 3rd period, drop fight-filled game 6-2
articles.description:
Montreal scored four goals in a five-minute span to snap a third-period tie.

The post Bruins give up 4 goals to Canadiens in 3rd period, drop fight-filled game 6-2 appeared first on Boston.com.
